title: Processing BSON Files
description: The bson files for this competition contain a list of dictionaries, one dictionary per product. Each dictionary contains a product id (key: _id), the category id of the product (key: category_id), and between 1-4 images, stored in a list (key: imgs). Each image list contains a single dictionary per image, which uses the format: {'picture': b'...binary string...'}. The bson file can be read and processed iteratively. The following code shows how to read the data from the train_example.bson file.
description_lemmatized: bson file competition contain list dictionary one dictionary per product dictionary contains product id key _id category id product key category_id 14 image stored list key imgs image list contains single dictionary per image us format picture bbinary string bson file read processed iteratively following code show read data train_examplebson file
